title: New: MUNA – Promise
content:
My favorite LA band MUNA have just returned with a new track Promise and oh boy, it’s a cracker.

Drenched in their beautifully 80’s infused anthemia, the jumping basslines and crushing drums stand as the perfect backdrop to the stark lyrical themes, delivered in typically great fashion from lead singer Katie Gavin. Oh, and be sure not to miss the gloriously over the top guitar solo during the songs closing minute. This is how pop music should be.

Be sure to see more of Katie, Josette and Naomi in the near future.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
